Author: mattculbreth
Content: Writing this now from my iPhone.  The Edge really isn't bad, and the WiFi is great.  It really is a nice Internet platform.

Author: amichail
Content: My prediction: this search engine will be a failure in terms of popularity but the company will likely be acquired by a major search player anyway.

Author: merrick33
Content:
Use www.prleap.com, just make sure to submit more than two days in advance if you submit for free, only the first 30 get into Google News each day. There are paid options which will get you into Google News as well.

I have seen Jajah, PageFlakes, Printingforless.com, and Squidoo releases on PR Leap.
